topRules.statement: Keep failure triage actionable by linking issues to reproducible commands and checks.
Benchmark after performance-affecting changes and compare against a baseline.
Add or update automated tests whenever behavior or interfaces change.
Track benchmark deltas and enforce regression gates in CI.
Validate integrations in realistic conditions before marking work complete.

antiPatterns: Are random/fuzz tests seeded + seed printed on failure
error: Recipe lint failed on line 35 with exit code 1
Show a test that would fail if mapping is off-by-one
Show bench baseline + latest bench delta; what fails CI on regression

ntm spawn cass-memory --cc=6 --cod=3 --gmi=2

bv --robot-triage

# 2. Clai
Alright, can we now let ums go through ALL my history with agents and learn from it (both CASS part and NCM part of our implementation).

# PLAN_FOR_UNIVERSAL_MEMORY_SYSTEM.md
**Project:** Universal Memory System (UMS) — persistent memory across coding agents + chat UIs  
**Goal:** One memory substrate, many LLMs. Mu

Table of Contents (11 Major Sections)
1. Executive Summary  
2. Core Architecture  
3. Conceptual Data Model (no schema yet)  
4. API / CLI Surface (commands & JSON contracts)  
5.

The Solution (UMS)
A memory system that treats “memory” as a **closed-loop control system**, not just a database:

### Three-layer cognitive architecture (CASS-style)
- **Episodic
